Title: Chapter 13
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Beau Willimon, Sam Forman (staff writer), Kate Barnow (story editor)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Kate Mara, Michael Kelly
Plot: Frank scrambles to keep his plan on track. Gillian is planning to sue Claire. Zoe, Janine, and Lucas investigate Rachel Posner and her relationship with Peter Russo.
